name: Width Departure Mismatch Factor (M_Wbf)
functionStatement: Bankfull dimensions match expected capacity for typical peak flows.
descriptionMarkdown: Mismatch factor: M = max(Wbf/Wref, Wref/Wbf). Lower is better; minimum is 1.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure Wbf; obtain Wref from regional curves; compute mismatch factor.

inputs.label: Width Departure Mismatch Factor (M_Wbf)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Bankfull width + regional reference curve for drainage area/slope.

references: regional hydraulic geometry / regime curves (where available).
